content: चर्चरिका, चर्चरी [चर्च्-बा° अरन् गैरा. ङीष्] {@--1@} A kind of song. {@--2@} Striking the hands to beat time (in music). {@--3@} The recitation of scholars. {@--4@} Festive sport, festive cries or merriment. {@--5@} A festival. {@--6@} Flattery. {@--7@} Curled hair. {@--8@} Triple symphony. {@--9@} Alternate recitation of a poem by two persons.
